title: Kioxia and Google Collaborate to Boost Clean Energy Use in Japan
description: YOKKAICHI, Japan — As part of its commitment towards a more sustainable future, Kioxia Corporation (“Kioxia”) today announced a collaborative initiative with Google LLC (“Google”) to boost its use of the clean electricity generated by a hydropower retrofit pr…
